item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, February 28, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

14. The Natural System of Colours (9 points | discuss)

27. Kastle (YC S24) Is Hiring – AI for Loan Servicing ( | hide)

29. Show HN: Python micro event loop library (~250 LOC) (33 points | discuss)
